title: Modern Mangalsutra with Diamond Accents
features: Delicate rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black beads. Features modern triangular pendants, each bezel-set with sparkling round cut diamonds creating a sophisticated, minimalist design. Modern twist to the traditional 'Pustelu Thadu'.
description: A contemporary interpretation of the sacred Mangalsutra, blending modern aesthetics with traditional symbolism. The delicate design makes it perfect for everyday wear. High-quality diamonds add a touch of sparkle and sophistication. Crafted with durable 18K rose gold, this piece is built to last. Represents enduring love and commitment.
